PINK ELEPHANT

What is Pink Elephant?

Pink Elephant is a first-of-its kind collaborative food transportation network. Think Uber Eats, but cheaper and more communal.

How does Pink Elephant work?

Everyone in the Pink Elephant system has a certain number of "favors." Anyone can cash in a favor to get food delivered right to them. Delivering food earns you favors. It's a win-win.

Who made Pink Elephant?

I did, you dummy.
